title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 231: Featuring Scott Gomez
description:
On Monday's episode, the guys are back after the holiday break and are joined by Scott Gomez. Scott joins (42:55) to talk about his career, mainly just the beginning because of how many stories were told. Winning the cup, playing with Claude Lemieux and a ton more good stories on tap. The guys also touch on the recent JR situation, along with some recent NHL news, a gambling corner, and a bunch more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
